item.title: The Angel Gabriel, John, Jesus, and Muhammad
item.description: This post is mainly about the Angel Gabriel, and the confusion that the revelations cause in interpreting the Abrahamic faiths: Gabriel first appears to John the Baptist’s father, Zacharias, preparing Zacharias for the arrival of John, from the womb of Mary’s cousin Elisabeth 10 And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense. 11 And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.
